name: Sizeable Burglary
description:
Sizeable Burglary 

- Made for the 85th MiniJam in 72 hours by 3 dudes with the goal of winning a game jam.

Please play in full screen mode!

How to Play (Read before Playing):

You play as Tom, a bank robber, who must acquire treasures and exit the bank in under a minute. 

Use the A and D keys or Arrow keys to move Tom left and right.

Use the space bar to jump.

Use R to restart level.

Use E to Shrink.

Use F to Grow.

The top right corner of the screen displays how many times you can change size per level and how many you already did. 

The Bottom Left of the screen displays what size you currently are.

All other instructions are in game. Beware to only grow or shrink when necessary.
